alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Winona, northeastern Wabasha, Buffalo and Trempealeau Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 100 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Modena to near Stockton. Movement was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Winona around 105 AM CDT. Mondovi around 110 AM CDT. Galesville around 120 AM CDT. Strum around 125 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Pioneer Campground, Merrick State Park, Camp Decorah, Cream, Chimney Rock, Mondovi Airfield, Highway 88 And County O, County Roads F And K K, Tamarack and Pleasantville. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota near mile marker 246. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern Minnesota...and west central Wisconsin.
